name: Basics of Summoning
description: A pamphlet containing basic spells in Summoning.

name: Summoning for the Apprintice.
description: A small tome containing more advanced Summoning spells, aimed at an intermediate apprintice.

name: The Magic of Light Infantry
description: A small textbook covering ancient infantry combat tactics. Though, reading through the pages, it seems to contain a wealth of information on... magic?

name: The Human Anatomy
description: This appears to be a college textbook on human anatomy, but looking through the pages.. it seems to contain several spells on the raising of corpses, as though the skull on the cover never gave it away.

name: The Gravediggers' Diary
description: A small, leather-bound book. It appears to be the diary of Stephen Worsdin, a gravedigger, and his accounts of work at the Barovian Private Cemetary.

name: Mystery at Port Mildonia
description: A small book, which appears to be upon a role-palying game, though the section on spells seems rather strange...

name: Blaster-Caster of the Magic-Master
description: A small book. Taking a look, it contains several spells, some of which you may know well!

name: Flames of Fury
description: A red, leather-bound book, sporting a mosaic of fire upon its cover. The contents seem to glow red once gazed upon.

name: Studies on the Crematorium
description: A small tome upon crematories, which seems quite informational. The chapter upon cremation seems quite strange...

name: Plight of the North
description: A fantasy novel, which regales the reader upon tales of fictonal barbarians, dragons, and other such things.

name: Journal of the Ice King
description: A publication of a personal journal upon the Ice King, and his penguin, Gunter, detailing their personal accounts of their lives.
